Generation I.Red: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.
Generation I.Yellow: It has 3 poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.
Generation I.Stadium: Flies at high speeds and attacks with three stingers: one on its rear and one on each of its two forelegs. May appear in swarms.

Generation II.Gold: It can take down any opponent with its powerful poison stingers. It sometimes attacks in swarms.
Generation II.Silver: It has three poison barbs. The barb on its tail secretes the most powerful poison.
Generation II.Crystal: It uses sharp, poisonous stings to defeat prey, then takes the victim back to its nest for food.
Generation II.Stadium 2: It can take down any opponent with its powerful poison stingers. It sometimes attacks in swarms. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) It has three poison barbs. The barb on its tail secretes the most powerful poison. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Beedrill is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest - this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack in a furious swarm.
Generation III.Sapphire: Beedrill is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest - this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack in a furious swarm.
Generation III.Emerald: A Beedrill is extremely territorial. For safety reasons, no one should ever approach its nest. If angered, they will attack in a swarm.
Generation III.FireRed: May appear in a swarm. Flies at violent speeds, all the while stabbing with the toxic stinger on its rear.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It flies at high speed and attacks using the large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

Generation IV.Diamond: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.
Generation IV.Pearl: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.
Generation IV.Platinum: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It can take down any opponent with its powerful poison stingers. It sometimes attacks in swarms.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It has three poison barbs. The barb on its tail secretes the most powerful poison.

Generation V.Black: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.
Generation V.White: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.
Generation V.Black 2: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.
Generation V.White 2: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.

Generation VI.X: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.
Generation VI.Y: May appear in a swarm. Flies at violent speeds, all the while stabbing with the toxic stinger on its rear.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Beedrill is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest—this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack in a furious swarm.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Beedrill is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest—this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack in a furious swarm.

Generation VII.Let's Go Pikachu: Its legs have become poison stingers. It stabs its prey repeatedly with the stingers on its limbs, dealing the final blow with the stinger on its rear.
Generation VII.Let's Go Eevee: Its legs have become poison stingers. It stabs its prey repeatedly with the stingers on its limbs, dealing the final blow with the stinger on its rear.

Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.
